content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work at 0400 hrs and when i was about two miles from my home i noticed a bright light ahead of me and to the left.  i initialy thought it to be an airplane but it wasn't really moving. as i continued driving and getting closer to it i rolled my window down to get a better look.  i thought it might have been a helicopter because it seemed to just hover.  it was moving very slow, and flying low, maybe 200 feet or so above the ground. as it approached i stuck my head out of the window to get a better look and as it flew over me i could tell that it was black, triangular in shape, and was silent. it made no noise. i turned on the street to my house and grabbed my cell phone to take a picture. i snapped two pics but the only thing it shows is two small white dots as it was flying away.  the craft was flying south, about 40 miles north west of houston. when i walked into my home i checked my watch and it was 0410 hrs. the object was large, maybe 200-300 feet long. i was impressed with how quiet it was and how low it was flying.  it wasnt much higher than the pine trees that grow out here. if i didnt see the lights i never would have seen it. i don't know how many lights were on it. i only saw one light as it approached, as it flew over i saw lights underneath it, but they werent as bright as the initial light i saw. it was just bright enough to illuminate the underside of the craft. after it passed, i only saw two lights in the rear. i don't know anything about this kind of stuff so i began a google search and found this web site.
content.summary: Black triangle flying low in southern direction, silent

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures of airplane contrails ovr my house. the next morning i was looking over my pictures, when i noticed an unusual object in the photo. i saw nothing unusual in the sky at the time i took the picture. i would have noticed something, i think, as my attention was directed on the sky. i don't recall hearing any noise or unusual sound. i have no idea what this thing is, not a bird, or bug, it certainly isn't a airplane or helicopter. i showed the photo to my wife, who is very skeptical of any kind of "paranormal" stuff.She couldn't figure out what it was, or could be. i took  the photo with my iphone's 12 megapixel camera. i don't think i was using the zoom.
  i have sent this picture, via email, to mr. robert gardner, who is in charge of these things in my part of pennsylvania. it was his request that i fill out this report,
content.summary: Took photo of object over my house

content.detailedDescription:
This happened yesterday, was sitting at my desk at university, getting ready to go to lunch.  i sit next to a wall of glass, large windows on the 4th floor which commands a large view of southern sky.  i often watch the sky for many reasons, one being to note birds (lack of lately).

i noticed 2 dark objects flying together, at first thought they were birds, as they approached closer saw the glint of sun on them, (was sunny and bright day-hot in 90s), then thought must be helicopters.  we have the life flight copters here, but they are blue and white and 2 would not be flying together, especially this close.  (these thoughts of logic and determination go through my mind when i see something, is a thought/deduction process).  they were flying low, about the altitude a copter would fly.  

i continued to watch as the moved closer and then realized they were unknown craft and knew what i was seeing was very likely extra terrestrial or unknown gov't technology.  i lean towards the former due to the fact these craft disappear so fast and quietly.  
 they moved slow, would "dance" around, getting so close looked like they were almost touching, then one would cavort around the other.  had no binocs or camera and the brightness of day made it hard to tell the shape (guessing triangular or saucer, but hard to say).  they started to move up over building, at this point i ran down stairs and out but they just vanished.

this is the second time in 3 months i have witnessed a ufo.  will submit the other later. i am well-versed in science and aware there are many races here and elsewhere.  i do not understand the denial at this point.
content.summary: 2 objects approached from southwest

content.detailedDescription:
Cylinder traveling "slowly" south to north, following the foothills and turning toward the west and over the mountain range, disappearing behind clouds.

i was in my livingroom and have three large windows to the west, preparing to watch tv. i saw the flaming cylinder and went to the windows and watched as it came up from the south. when it started to turn to the west, i turned my back to it and went to the east of the livingroom where i had my binoculars.  i brought them back and put them to my eyes to see if there were portals and visible means of propulsion.  only slightly larger flames at the back, no portals.

i was certain it was an unidentifed flying object. 

i was a member of the mufon in morrison, colorado at the time.

i tried to report this sighting on the mufon network, colorado, but was unable to do so that night but reported it in the morning of the 12th.

no fear.
content.summary: Large fiery cylinder

content.detailedDescription:
Whilst out having a cigarette in my back yard i noticed the sky was very clear and the only cloud was where the sun was setting.  i noticed two strange objects, one which appeared stationary and the other had what looked like a vapour trail as it if was moving.  at first glance the object with the trail could have been mistaken for a aeroplane however the object seemed too distant to be considered a plane in my opinion (ive seen many aeroplanes in the area).  in a rush to find my camera i realised my batteries where dead and i had to replace them quickly accidently resetting the internal camera clock which explain why the date on the pictures is incorrect.

the objects where there for approx 45min with the sunset taking them out of my view.  during this time the object with the trail seemed to fade into obscurity whilst the stationary oject remained prominent.

the incidint left me very excited as i have had earlier experiences before but never had a camera to hand! obviously i remain skeptical about my pictures and what they could be but i have exhausted all avenues and now i turn to mufon for help on this.

any light you can shine on these pics would be much appreciated!

thanks

wez hall 

ps there are another three pictures available - i have picked the best three to submit to you as your system allows me to do so.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Star-like
content.summary: Whilst out in my back yard i noticed two objects in the sky one stationary the other moving.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming back from a poker tournament with a friend and the sky was still bright. i saw something in the air about 60-100 ft.  i kept looking and couldn't figure out what it was, it stayed in the same spot and as we were getting closer to it coming down the highway (mariposa rd.) toward stockton from oakdale i kept looking at  and saying do you see that april? do you see that? it was not a balloon, or weather balloon, or a chinese lantern or a model airplane or a regular airplane or a helicopter, my mind couldn't wrap around it because i have never seen anything like it. it looked like a large jellyfish with a round top, something around the middle and large wavy things that hung down as it hovered that came to a point at a wide angle. it did not have any lights, and it was a dark grey color, not shiny or bright or mult colored at all. we turned around to try to catch it on video on our phones, i don't think we were successful because we didn't see it again. shortly after we turned around a jet flying very low passed by very near where we saw it, going very fast. i have never seen anything like this in my life! oh, and we didn't hear it make any sound which was weird. we scanned the entire sky looking for it again, in the fields, on the side of the road, everywhere, and it was gone! poof!! i was so scared i didn't know what to do, but thought i should report it. the crossroad where we turned around at was wagner rd. we saw the object, that was definitely a ufo right above the road above a cow farm on our left. i can't think of anything else that i remember, but i drew a picture of it after we got back into town.
content.summary: Dark medium size like a car, looked like a jellyfish

content.detailedDescription:
Unknown object in pics of sunset on 6/09/2011 that were not visible to the naked eye.
there is a heavy blanket of smoke over the whole state from forest fires in arizona and planes and even stars have not been visible for the last week. this is the third time and last time i am going to try to submit these. your website has errored on me 2 times already.

more pics on my facebook page at [link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Pictures of sunset in abq. , n.M. on 06/09/2011

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside and looked up to see a white cigar-shaped ufo heading east over moose jaw. it didn't appear to have any wings or trails. i've included a few cropped screenshots of a few frames from the video recording of the event. i wish to retain the video recording from mufon because it would end up on the public domain. there were a few witnesses i will not be including on the mufon report form. if mufon wishes to have a copy of the video recording, contact me via the email provided on my report form, so long as the video is not made out publicly. i will add also that during the night i was watching the sky to see star-like objects heading north. they did the usual... see my previous reports for details. thank you
content.summary: Cigar-shaped ufo over moose jaw, saskatchewan

content.detailedDescription: The other was shaped like a disk a cloud like appearance around it, i counted not all but at least about 3-4 lights. it was going around and around. it started out with the first shorter description as i described moving in a west direction sitting there for about 30 seconds then it began to proceed in the west direction of tremont avenue going towards central avenue. the craft did not have no sound at all. it was very quiet gliding across the sky. i just woke up exactly at 4:00 a.M. getting up out of my bed looking out my window when i spotted the craft. this is no joke. for a person who didnt believe that ufo's existed, i jumped out of my skin. i knew definitely it was not an airplane, nor jet. absolutely!!! positively!!! you may call me. but i don't have a camera available, now i will purchase one soon. for sure...
content.summary: There were two (one of them was just a light like a circle that sat in the sky for a long time.

content.detailedDescription:
I looked to the west at around 8-8:30 p.M. and saw what looked like a star, but it was moving. it had a redish-orangeish hue to it and there were no lights blinking, no sound. it moved zig-zig across the sky in a linear fashion, from north to south, south to north, then it would fly up straight and disappear, then reappear.  then it would stop and just sit there and after a few seconds, it would start to move again across the sky...Again, no flickering lights like a plane or jet, no lights/search light from a helicopter (it was up rather too high to be a helicopter; however, couldn't tell you how high it was), no sound.  at one point a small plane was heading toward its direction and as it do so, the object moved away from the plane in a linear fashion.  after the plane was gone, it moved back toward the north without turning. it just moved back to position in that linear/straight fashion. it moved, disappeared, reappeared...And then it turned to a bright, white light and took off at a high speed to the southwest - i said omg. it wasn't a plane, jet, or helicopter..That's all i know- definitely not normal.

i have seen meteors and "falling stars" (which it wasn't), and this was not a plane, jet, or helicopter, or satellite (unless satellites are able to move back and forth across the sky in a linear fashion like that). it looked like a reddish light (as bright as a star; no blinking light, no sound), maneuvering back and forth from the north to south, south to north, and then would hover for several seconds (looked like it was over the everglades - that's how far west i live), and it was intelligently controlled, as when the small plane headed toward it, it moved to the south at a high speed to get away from the plane, so....Like i said, it was a ufo in my opinion, and after my being on this planet for 52 years - have never seen anything like it - makes me wonder what or who is flying around in our skies at night and for what purpose (my roommate also witnessed it, as i called her outside to see it, too). it was there for approx 10 minutes, then took off at high speed to the sw.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Look up towards the west and saw a ufo which first looked like a star, but it was moving back and forth from north to south, south to north.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i took our dog for a walk some time after 9pm.  we had barely even begun our walk around harvest park when i noticed the lights in the sky.  two craft, closer than i've ever seen two craft together.  they weren't air show close, but they were closer than i could imagine would be safe for civilian craft, with one slightly elevated above the other.  they were identical, and had both solid and blinking lights, the color of which i would describe as a deep, saturated yellow.  they were low, less than 20 degress above the horizon, traveling at a steady rate of speed without changing direction. the air speed wasn't out of range of terrestrial craft, but they were moving at a pretty good clip.  

i immediately regretted not taking my phone.  i could have shot photos or even taken video.  there was still a bit of light in the sky and they were close enough.  i also wish i had done a better job of chiseling details into memory.  i know they had more than 3 lights visible each, but i can't remember if it was 4 or 5.  i can't recall the positioning of the lights relative to which were blinking and which were steady.  i am attaching a mockup i made in photoshop.  bear in mind my memory of the craft is somewhat sketchy, so it's not completely accurate.    

i stopped and watched the craft track from east to south as my wife walked on.  i listened intently, but heard nothing but the wind.  and the wind was coming from the direction of the craft.  no jet engine roar.  no propeller noise.  no helicopter sound.  they were so low, they actually disappeared behind trees on the horizon.  i ran to catch up with my wife.  

no sooner did i reach her and the dog than we spotted another pair of identical craft to the north, heading west.  these were a bit farther off and slightly higher up, but they were just as close to each other.  

it gets stranger.  i wanted to rule out helicopters before making a final judgement, so i made a series of phone calls.  first, i called wesley medical center, wichita life watch and eagle med to determine they didn't have any helicopters paired up and working over wichita at the time.  i called the local faa who said they didn't know of anything.  they pointed me to the mid-continent control tower.  

this is where my hunt for an answer took a turn.  i had a very weird conversation with a woman named peggy.  i literally didn't even have my question out before she was answering it.  no there wasn't anything going on.  she was outside at that time and didn't see anything.  but here's the deal - i hadn't even mentioned the time frame before she had begun answering my question, and confidently at that.  my intuition was screaming.  i have no proof, but i can tell you it seemed very much like she knew exactly what i was talking about before i was even done talking about it.  she was outside at that time and didn't see anything?  she started answering before i even mentioned the time!  i quickly developed the impression i might be the first person she'd talked to about lights in the sky last night.  

then peggy suggested i talk to the tv news stations in town.  if anything was going on, those people always knew about it, she said.  she was almost confrontational at this point.  but i wasn't looking for information on ufos, and i hadn't even alluded to them.  i was looking for info on aircraft in the sky at that time.  why did she go there?  why was the traffic control information person pawning me off to news stations about craft in the sky, anyway?  does. not. add. up!

last night was warm and there were other people out and about.  i figured if my wife and i saw something over a densely populated area, certainly someone else did.  so i checked ufostalker this morning.  i do this almost daily anyway, and i can tell you it's rare to have a recent mufon report from our region.  anything close is usually from oklahoma or kansas city (there has been a spate of sightings of multiple orange lights there recently).  but lo and behold, there was a marker over wichita, ks this morning - the first since may 23!  seems someone on the east side of town saw something, too.  this sighting is similar in that there were two craft together, but these were described as orange lights.

if you're from the area and are reading this because you're looking to see if someone else saw what you saw last night, please leave a comment on this blog post and tell us what you saw!  then, report it at mufondotcom.  for the sake of truth, please do it.
content.summary: 2 pairs of silent craft with multiple yellow lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside most of the night looking up at the sky.  at approximately 11:00 pm to midnight ( somewhere in that time frame ) i saw what appeared to be a meteor at first burning in the sky...But upon closer inspection this was not the case.

an extremely bright light lit up above the house...Reminded me of a florescent bulb...Started off kind of slow the zipped over the house extremely fast and extremely bright...Went behind the trees and it was almost like it dimmed itself and was not visible around the other side of the tree.  this light could not of been more than a couple hundred feet off the ground it was extremely close and fast.  there was no noise what so ever.  ive seen meteorites fall before and this just couldn't of been one in my opinion.  my grandmother also saw this as she was sitting right beside me.  we both just kind of froze in place.  my initial response to question myself if i really just saw that.  it was that wierd of an occurrence.  

it was witnessed out in the country about a mile south east of grand lake. i think its ironic that we were talking about ufo when we saw it.
content.summary: Extremely bright light zipped across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was sixteen at the time and living in a group home just outside of millbrook newyork, i was on van detail(cleaning the vans) with a friend that night after group. it was about 10:30 in the middle of november so it was pretty chilly. we just finished washing the last of three vans and i grabbed the hose and stepped back to begin rinsing, so i was standing maybe 6 or 7 feet from the van on the passenger side. at that point i noticed a group of lights some distance away.
at first glance i took it for an airplane, (at first) because it was triangular shaped, and was moving too slow to be a plane. after watching for about thirty seconds another one appeared trailing behind it.(when i say appeared i mean suddenly it was there, like turning on a light switch) then a third appeared, in the same way. now we have three sets of lights, and each set had three lights, each one triangular in shape.
the second and third craft followed the same path as the first, which was i guess you would call a serpentine flight path. i would have to say that they were at the height you would expect a passenger plane to fly. maybe about a mile from where we were standing. my friend greg didnt notice until he saw me just standing looking over the van, by this time the second one had appeared, asked  me what it was, i said i didnt know.I wanted to say that they were planes, but i have never seen planes move the way they did, flying in the pattern they were flying and as slow as they were moving, back and forth in an "s" pattern. dropping below the mountain range then coming back up. so my next guess was helicopters. now i'm sure that helicopters could probably match the manuvers that these craft were performing, but not as close as they were to each other, and there was no sound, none. so for the next maybe 25, 30 minutes this went on. and greg and i watched until they dropped below the horizon one last time and didnt reappear. now during this time i didnt experiance any strange sensations other than feeling compelled to watch. after standing outside for another few minutes trying to make sense of what we just watched, and neither of us not wanting to say what we were really thinking i reached to open the back door and thats when i noticed the two dogs that lived there were just on the other side, with their ears up, on alert. i opened the door brutus,(a great dane) and sarge,(a german shepperd) bolted out the door. and like a bat out of hell they took off into the woods. after about 10 to 15 seconds there was a huge commotion in the woods. what sounded like at least half a dozen dogs barking, snarling, and some howling. and something screaming.(i say something because it wasnt a dog. it was something i couldnt identify) now that scared me. withinin seconds our dogs came running back, i mean really fast and were uneasy and very nervous for most of the night. later on i would say around 1:30 the girls in the girls dorm started screaming and said they saw someone at the balcony door. i dont know if that was related to what greg and i saw or the incident with the dogs but needless to say it was a very strange night to say the least.
i guess the reason i am telling this story is because i want to know if anyone else in the ducthess county area witnessed these craft around november of 1986
content.summary: Three seperate craft on manuvers in the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
Last night i saw 2 events on the beach in front of the resort i was staying at(ocean creek) [which i reported]

tonight my dad and i decided walk walk don to the beach a little earlier to see what we could see.

we reached the shoreline at 9:35 and immediately saw 3 red-orange flashes to our se.  over the next hour we saw 7-9 grouping of the red-orange lights flashing with anywhere from 1-7 lights in each event usually flashing in a sequence, once with two flashing on and off moving in a line across the sky.

after 40 minutes we saw what appeared to be 4 fighter jets (my dad saw 6) flying at a very high altitude to where the highest amount of activity had been over the ocean.  they then returned from the direct that they came from.

we saw 2 more events after this with the red-orange flares.  the last occurring at 10:34pm.

we never heard anything, but that is not unusual due to the high speed winds coming off the ocean.

the total number of red-orange lights we saw was probably between 40-60 over the course of the hour
content.summary: From 9:35-10:35 saw multiple red-orange spheres light up from n. myrtle beach

content.detailedDescription: First saw the series of lights over the ocean (clear night, so no cloud to judge height) while sitting on the front porch of a beach house overlooking the beach.  one light, then another to the right of it, and then another.  each light would hold anywhere from a second to 15 seconds.  they didn't turn on or off, but would flare up and back down, like the fire of an engine or something hot.  the objects would appear, dissappear and fly off at different intervals.  at one point there were 8+ lights in the sky.  the way they would appear/disappear reminded me of how starships would come out of hyperspace in star wars, except the brightness of the engines would only flare as it was stopping and then the light would fade as it moved away.  we saw probably 50~60 lights in different spots over the course of 30 minutes, but i don't know if they were the same thing or different.  about 20 minutes after seeing them, we started to see white (not orange) flashing lights from aircraft (about 5~8), likely military, come into the same area where the lights were.  a few more of the orange flares came back in the area, but were soon gone and the flashing aircraft lights soon left after there were no lights left.  there was no sound during the entire incident.
content.summary: Lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from the river festival and we turned east and saw two large fireballs in the sky. at first i thought it was two planets close together till the top one got brighter and the bottom one went out completely. within seconds the other was gone. i was shocked and asked the others in the car "did you see that??!!" and sure enough they saw it too. they really stood out in the sky. hopefully some fellow wichitans saw the whole event since most are out and about for the festival. wish i had gotten some photos, we even kept driving around trying to catch a view of where they went.
content.summary: Two large orange fireballs observed in the eastern sky over wichita ks

content.detailedDescription: There are 2 stars in the night sky very close together and can be seen by looking up and to the south a little. one is brighter than the other. seen about 10pm in st louis missouri. one is in a 1 oclock position in relation to the other. the distance between them changes over a period of 1 or 2 months. they cant be a planet in out solar system because they would not take that long to change position. also they cannot be stars as they would not change positions or distance to each other for many years or hundreds of years. if they are not planets or stars can anyone tell me what they are and if they can see them through a telescope what are they? thanks very much. {name deleted move to evidence section{fg [email removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Two unusual stars

content.detailedDescription: I saw a long shinny cylinder in the north/west sky around 6:54am. as i was going to my car to go to work. the sun was out, and there were no stars in the sky that i could see. i went back into my house and got my camera, this took about 3 minutes; and to my surprise the object was still there. after snapping the first shot, it was gone. i watch the skies every time i go outside, and i've seen a lot of strange crafts in the skies, but this was the first time i was able to get a photo of what i've seen.
content.summary: Long and shinny

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting outside my brother-in-law who is the (witheld).  he was home for a visit and we saw this glowing object last night that came over 3 times.  the video i posted will describe it the best vs my words.  the link is 

[link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Orange glowing disk

content.detailedDescription: I started taking pictures in my car on my camera phone of the sun on my lunch break.  just because i've recently heard of an object near the sun.  i took 4 pictures with something that seems to be orbiting the sun.  it appears to be a half moon shape.  maybe a satellite?
content.summary: Picture of something orbiting the sun

content.detailedDescription: Took the dog out she was overly restless and barking. she kept barking to the south. i was looking all around the neighborhood not seeing anything. she was racing around and i happened to look up facing the south already and seen the same object i viewed on may 20th. it was just hovering above the graveyard at the end of our street.I came in the house for camera and a witness. we stood there and watched it a few minutes and it took off to the southeast very slow moving. the white background lighted the object but i couldn't tell the shape of it. it had red lights all around it.. nothing blinked. it was pretty high up off the ground but i cant say for sure how high it was. with my dog still being nutty i brought her in and locked the doors. chalked it up as yet another ufo sighting out here in the country. the photos i attempted to take didn't turn out.
content.summary: White lit object of unknown shape lined with red lights sitting stationary over a graveyard.

content.detailedDescription: I was hanging out at a friends house and we decided to star gaze for the night since it was a beautiful day and clear night. it didnt take long for the first ufo to fly over. from my perspective i saw what first looked like a star moving slowly across the sky. i automatically knew that it couldnt be a plane because first, it was high enough to be thought as a star second, it didnt make any sound and it disappeared right after it cross over me. man made object usually have flashing lights, this didnt, it was just a glowing light moving very swift through the night sky. after that first sighting, i didnt take my eye off the sky for a spit second. as minutes went by i began to see more of these star like objects crossing the night sky one by one about every 20 minutes. one in particular was crossing the sky in a swirl zig zag way, like the way a snake moves on the ground. after about a hour's past, i have seen a total of 6 unidentified objects. that really amazes me because this is my 3 ufo sighting in the past 3 weeks for me and i have never seen any before so. one that completely blew me away was a week ago when me and a buddy were laying on a trampoline star gazing and we both saw a object that looked like a moving star due to how far away it seemed. it was moving at a very slow rate to a complete stop when it then turned into a huge blue flash and it was gone. something that gets me is that tonight, each time i lost sight of the ufo it was a few seconds each time one would pass. as if it was flying so fast in space, i only got quick glimpses of them. i dont know how to explain what i have me seeing in the night skies lately but i hope its a sign that change is coming somehow and they can finally reveal themselves to our planet with open arms. thats all i have to say.
content.summary: Star like lights flying over the grosse pointe woods area in michigan.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in bed at 2 in the morning trying to jailbreak this ipod. i hear a kind of humming soung coming from the outside sky sounds like a big sound or something. so it contines torward my house and maybe a few past it but as it dosent go away i start to get scared i was about to crap myself ive heard low flying planes and helicopters and this was not either of then, during this event my home phone had the no signal tone for about a minute and my tv turned black for a few secounds. the whole thing lasted like 15 minutes and after that i believe in ufos.
content.summary: The sound

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving home down a busy two lane road in franklin, tn.  suddenly, my husband pulled the car over to the shoulder.  it was 9:05 at night and he pointed up into the sky.  over a field to our left, we saw five orange sphere-like objects hovering around each other.  they were divided into groups of two and three.  these spheres appeared to be probe-like.  this made us uneasy.

my husband took a picture with his cell phone.  after 2 or 3 minutes, the first group disappeared and then the second group.
content.summary: Five orange spheres were hovering in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I viewed an object while out on a dark spot looking up at the night sky on a public boat ramp pier.  as i was walking out i wanted to look up at the night sky and viewed a strange orange star like object which i estimate may have been at an altitude of possibly 20,000ft. or so.  this object appeared as one of the regular stars in the sky and then began to move slowly to about a 50 degree level opposed to the horizon.  this object then simply disappeared without a trace.  no sounds were heard.  about a week earlier i had viewed something similar at almost an angle of 90 degrees while laying on my back after a jog.  i was looking straight up and viewed a green colored starlike object moving at about the same speed.  this object was moving and came to a dead stop straight up at about the same altitude.  i remained fixated on this point for about 25 minutes and it did not move from that spot and i decided to go home.  it never moved from the position in which it had stopped moving too.
content.summary: Orange star like object seen moving and then vanishing.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting at the beach staring out at the ocean when i saw a bright red orange light appear directly in front of me over the ocean at about a height of 40 degrees in the sky, within another second another light appeared to the right of it, and another second later a third light appeared beneath them creating a triangle that was upside down. after 1-2 more seconds the lights turned off in sequence in the same order they turned on with around a second passing between each light disappearing. 

knowing that this was no ship/plane/man-made/natural object i decided to walk down the beach closer to where i was staying while still staring at the same point in the sky.  around 5-10 minutes later another one of the points appeared in the same area and after another second a second point appeared directly next to it.  they stayed on together for 1-2 seconds and then turned off in sequence as with the first event.

at this point i went back to my room to investigate similar events.  i was back at the beach from 10:45-12:00 and saw nothing else.
content.summary: 6/7/2011  3 red-orange points of light (then 2) turning on and off in sequence over n. myrtle beach

content.detailedDescription: On june 3 2011 me and my wife were driving home from visiting family in bertram texas on hwy 281 when on the right side of the highway flying just below the tops of the hills we both saw from about 2 miles away a cigar shaped object flying from left to right.Upon seeing the object it was obvious that it was not an aircraft from here so i diciede to speed up to get a closer look i did so with out losing sight of the craft but when he had gone about a quarter of a mile it just dissappered.Unfourtantley i can not be sure of the exact time.The craft did not scare or freighten me or my wife in any way
content.summary: Cigar shaped object near blanco

content.detailedDescription: I had taken the dogs outside to do their business, and my olde english bulldogge, who has only barked twice in a year and is a very quiet dog, started to whimper and try to hide behind me, staring off to the north. i look and there, at about approximately 2 oclock position in the northern sky, is a very bright white light, with about 4 red lights coming off from it. i thought it was a plane but after watching it for about 7 minutes, i realized it was just hanging there. i took 3 steps forward towards it, and it started to move towards me. roughly 11 minutes after i initially spotted it, it flashed really brightly, all the lights, and took off straight towards me, heading south. it passed over myself and 3 dogs, my home, at maybe 600 feet, absolutely silent, and huge. it passed over me, and sped up, blinking out of sight in a matter of moments after passing
content.summary: Very bright and quiet

content.detailedDescription:
Weston, colorado is the closest major city i can conjure up that it was sighted over.  it was late at night and completely dark except for a few stars and a waning moon.  i was hiking back to an oil drill with some friends on a farm and when we came back to a clearing, we all noticed that basically every single animal living on the farm had followed us thru the woods and back to the clearing.  5 dogs and about the same number of cats.  it was eerily still and quiet.  we had also heard coyotes/wolves howling about an hour before sighting for at least 30 minutes. 

i glanced up at the sky and my first reaction was "wow, that is a really bright star"/"wow that one individual star is brighter than all others and putting off a lot of light".  

then i realized how much it was twinkling.  i thought "okay, i know stars do twinkle like the song but this thing is strobing".

still unconvinced it was potentially a ufo/alien spacecraft, it then began to move.  back and forth.  and up and down a little but mostly back and forth.  i summoned 2 of my friends i was with to coo-berate this with me and they couldn't believe their eyes either!  it kept moving side to side, and then disappeared/faded out.  within seconds, it reappeared in the same exact spot, moved a little more, then disappeared/faded out for good.
content.summary: Very bright, multi colored, twinkling object moving randomly

content.detailedDescription:
On june 7th,2011 i looked through my camera pics from may 22nd, 2011 and notice a possible ufo.  don't recall seeing anything in the sky that day.
bowling green, ky

the object in question is located in the upper right corner of attached photo.

camera is a coolpix s8100
content.summary: Ufo shows up in pic
